COMPILATION_ERROR.suggestion: Check detailed logs above for root cause and retry build after fixing issues.

TEST_FAILURE.suggestion: Review failed test cases and ensure test data is correct.

DEPENDENCY_ERROR.suggestion: Verify dependency versions in pom.xml and check repository accessibility.

CHECKSTYLE_ERROR.suggestion: Fix code style violations and check checkstyle configuration.

JAVA_VERSION_MISMATCH.suggestion: Verify Java version in build environment and pom.xml.

OUT_OF_MEMORY.suggestion: Increase memory allocation for the build or optimize memory usage.

MAVEN_PLUGIN_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the required Maven plugin is installed and correctly configured.

MISSING_CLASS.suggestion: Verify classpath configuration and ensure dependencies are properly included.

MISSING_METHOD.suggestion: Check if the method exists in the correct version of the dependency.

CONNECTION_TIMEOUT.suggestion: Check network connectivity and increase connection timeout in Maven settings.

AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE.suggestion: Verify credentials in settings.xml and check user permissions.

PERMISSION_DENIED.suggestion: Ensure appropriate file permissions and user access rights.

GIT_ERROR.suggestion: Check Git repository URL, credentials, and branch availability.

SSL_ERROR.suggestion: Verify SSL certificates and Java keystore settings.

JAR_NOT_FOUND.pattern: Could not find artifact .+ in central
JAR_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Ensure the artifact exists in Maven repository or check repository settings.

MAVEN_COMPATIBILITY_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure parent POM exists and is accessible.

FORK_FAILURE.suggestion: Check for missing dependencies or configuration issues in Surefire plugin.

PORT_BIND_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the port is not already occupied by another process.

GROOVY_COMPILATION_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure that all required tools (e.g., Maven) are correctly installed and configured in Jenkins global tool settings.

MAVEN_TOOL_NOT_FOUND.pattern: Tool type \"maven\" does not have an install of \".*\" configured
MAVEN_TOOL_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Check Jenkins global tool configuration to ensure Maven is installed and referenced correctly in the pipeline script.

COMPILATION_ERROR.suggestion: Check detailed logs above for root cause and retry build after fixing issues.

TEST_FAILURE.suggestion: Review failed test cases and ensure test data is correct.

DEPENDENCY_ERROR.suggestion: Verify dependency versions in pom.xml and check repository accessibility.

CHECKSTYLE_ERROR.suggestion: Fix code style violations and check checkstyle configuration.

JAVA_VERSION_MISMATCH.suggestion: Verify Java version in build environment and pom.xml.

OUT_OF_MEMORY.suggestion: Increase memory allocation for the build or optimize memory usage.

MAVEN_PLUGIN_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the required Maven plugin is installed and correctly configured.

MISSING_CLASS.suggestion: Verify classpath configuration and ensure dependencies are properly included.

MISSING_RESOURCE.suggestion: Check if the method exists in the correct version of the dependency.

CONNECTION_TIMEOUT.suggestion: Check network connectivity and increase connection timeout in Maven settings.

AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE.suggestion: Verify credentials in settings.xml and check user permissions.

GROOVY_COMPILATION_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure that all required tools (e.g., Maven) are correctly installed and configured in Jenkins global tool settings.

MAVEN_TOOL_NOT_FOUND.pattern: Tool type \"maven\" does not have an install of \".*\" configured
MAVEN_TOOL_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Check Jenkins global tool configuration to ensure Maven is installed and referenced correctly in the pipeline script.

JENKINS_STARTUP_FAILURE.suggestion: This error usually indicates a corrupted Jenkins configuration file or plugin. Review the Jenkins logs to identify the problematic configuration or plugin and rectify it.

GROOVY_CLASS_RESOLUTION_ERROR.suggestion: This error suggests that the Groovy script is unable to find a specified class. Ensure that all necessary classes are imported correctly and that the classpath is properly configured.

MISSING_FILE_OR_DIRECTORY.suggestion: This error indicates that Jenkins is unable to find the specified file or directory. Verify the path provided in your Jenkins job configuration and ensure the file or directory exists at the specified location.

JENKINS_PIPELINE_SYNTAX_ERROR.suggestion: This error points to a syntax issue in your Jenkins Pipeline script. Use the Jenkins Pipeline Syntax tool to validate the script and identify any errors or warnings.

JENKINS_GROOVY_SCRIPT_ERROR.suggestion: This error occurs when a Groovy script tries to access a property that doesn't exist. Check the script for typos or incorrect property names.

JENKINS_PLUGIN_ERROR.suggestion: This error often arises from plugin incompatibilities. Ensure all Jenkins plugins are up-to-date and compatible with your Jenkins version.

JENKINS_DISK_SPACE_ERROR.suggestion: Jenkins is unable to write to disk due to insufficient space. Free up disk space on the Jenkins server and consider setting up disk usage monitoring.

JENKINS_PERMISSION_DENIED_ERROR.suggestion: Jenkins does not have the necessary permissions to execute a script or access a file. Verify the permissions of the Jenkins user and adjust them as needed.

JENKINS_AGENT_CONNECTION_ERROR.suggestion: This error indicates a loss of connection between the Jenkins master and agent. Check the network connectivity and firewall settings between the master and agent machines.

JENKINS_GIT_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR.suggestion: Jenkins is unable to authenticate with the Git repository. Verify the credentials and ensure they are correctly configured in Jenkins.

JENKINS_SCM_ERROR.suggestion: This error suggests an issue with the Source Code Management (SCM) configuration. Check the repository URL and credentials.

JENKINS_MAVEN_BUILD_FAILURE.suggestion: The Maven build has failed. Review the error messages above this line in the log to identify the cause and address it accordingly.

JENKINS_MAVEN_COMPILATION_FAILURE.suggestion: There are compilation errors in the Maven build. Check the detailed error messages to identify and fix the issues in the code.

JENKINS_MAVEN_TEST_FAILURE.suggestion: Test execution has failed. Review the test results to identify failing tests and address the underlying issues.

DEPENDENCY_RESOLUTION_ERROR.pattern: Could not resolve dependencies for project
DEPENDENCY_RESOLUTION_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the required dependencies exist in the specified repository and check the internet connection or repository credentials.

SYNTAX_ERROR.suggestion: Check for incorrect syntax, missing colons, incorrect indentation, or mismatched parentheses.

INDENTATION_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure consistent indentation using spaces or tabs. Avoid mixing both.

TYPE_ERROR.suggestion: Check data types in function calls and operations. Convert variables if necessary.

NAME_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the variable or function is defined before use.

INDEX_ERROR.pattern: IndexError: list index out of range
INDEX_ERROR.suggestion: Check list length before accessing elements by index.

KEY_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the dictionary contains the key before accessing it.

VALUE_ERROR.suggestion: Check if the function arguments or data formats are valid.

ATTRIBUTE_ERROR.suggestion: Ensure the object has the specified attribute before accessing it.

MODULE_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Ensure the required module is installed and the import statement is correct.

IMPORT_ERROR.suggestion: Check module paths and dependencies. Ensure required modules are installed.

IO_ERROR.suggestion: Check file paths, permissions, and disk space before performing I/O operations.

ZERO_DIVISION_ERROR.suggestion: Avoid dividing by zero. Check for zero before performing division.

RECURSION_ERROR.suggestion: Check recursive function calls to prevent infinite recursion.

MEMORY_ERROR.suggestion: Optimize memory usage. Consider processing data in smaller chunks.

TIMEOUT_ERROR.suggestion: Increase timeout limits or optimize code to prevent long execution times.

CONNECTION_ERROR.suggestion: Check network connectivity and ensure the server is reachable.

SSL_ERROR.suggestion: Verify SSL certificates and ensure secure connections.

GIT_TOOL_NOT_FOUND.pattern: Selected Git installation does not exist\. Using Default
GIT_TOOL_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Ensure Git is installed and configured correctly in Jenkins global tool settings.

NO_CREDENTIALS_SPECIFIED.suggestion: Add appropriate credentials in Jenkins for secure repository access.

DOCKER_BUILD_ERROR.suggestion: Review the Dockerfile and check for syntax errors or missing files.

DOCKER_CONTAINER_NOT_RUNNING.pattern: Jenkins does not seem to be running inside a container
DOCKER_CONTAINER_NOT_RUNNING.suggestion: Ensure Jenkins is running inside a container or check the Docker configuration.

JENKINS_DOCKER_PERMISSION_DENIED.pattern: permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket
JENKINS_DOCKER_PERMISSION_DENIED.suggestion: Add the Jenkins user to the Docker group and restart the service.

PYTHON_REQUIREMENTS_FAIL.pattern: ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement .*
PYTHON_REQUIREMENTS_FAIL.suggestion: Verify the package name and version in 'requirements.txt' and check the package index.

DEBCONF_FRONTEND_ERROR.suggestion: Set the 'DEBIAN_FRONTEND' environment variable to 'noninteractive' for Docker builds.

NO_SUCH_DSL_METHOD.suggestion: Verify the Jenkins Pipeline script and ensure all necessary plugins are installed.

JUNIT_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Ensure the 'JUnit Plugin' is installed and configured in Jenkins.
